ovdesc.p: This application holds the details of Standard Mapping Objects and its properties to be used when creating Scripts for a Workflow.This application would be used effectively for building the static objects by their Object name and its properties when Scripts are being built for workflows like SIGN.ON,CONTRACT, ENQUIRY etc.

desc.p: This holds the name of the Static Objects defined in UI.OBJECTS specific to Workflows.
Valid record in UI.T24.OBJ.PROPERTIES must exist first and use the same ID.
Reserved for future use, currently this field has no functionality.
This field refers to the Property names of the Objects defaulted from UI.OBJ.PROPERTIES application when the Object.Name has been selected.
The Object value based on the type of Object.Name field that has been selected will be entered here.This field holds no validation.
